title: Instructional Design Competency Development Program for Blended Learning: Enhancing Teacher Expertise with LLM Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Language Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning instructional design competency development program at corporate-affiliated university institutions, offering case-based practical training and personalized feedback to enhance workplace relevance for employees

learning_goals: Learners independently perform at least three stages of the instructional design process using LLM-based tools in blended learning environments
Learners develop at least two customized blended learning modules based on learner analysis
In PBL projects, learners create at least five types of instructional materials (activity sheets, assessment tools, etc.) by applying LLM tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
